text:
Hi all. I have an iframe embedded in a blog. It was working fine for over a year and then all of a sudden, it stopped being formatted correctly. For some reason, I can no longer add "height: 100%; width: 100%;" as inline styles on the iframe.

Any idea why I can't do this?
It's hard to say why it's not working without a link - If you post a link here I can have a look.

I ended up adding a class to the div container around the iframe and then adding the CSS in the blog stylesheet. Works fine. Just interested in the fact that the blog editor would allow some in-line styles but not others.
